algorithmTitle.pt-br: CarolApp Monitor - Health Check for CarolApps
algorithmTitle.en-US: CarolApp Monitor - Health Check for CarolApps

algorithmDescription.pt-br: The CarolApp Monitor is a simple and useful application to monitor and automatically restart online CarolApps if they are not running.
algorithmDescription.en-US: The CarolApp Monitor is a simple and useful application to monitor and automatically restart online CarolApps if they are not running.
